body:
Comment 2: 
The string looks like this:

usage: 6l [-options] [-E entry] [-H head] [-I interpreter] [-L dir] [-T text] [-R rnd]
[-r path] [-o out] [-V] main.6

The "-options" clause encompasses the options that do not take another argument.  They
could be better documented but the real documentation for 6l is at

godoc 6l

and that reports the -V flag.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
